An answer vnto my lord of wynthesters [sic] booke intytlyd a detection of the deuyls sophistrye wherwith he robith the vnlernyd people of the trew byleef in the moost blessyd sacrament of the aulter made by Johann Hoper. Hooper, John, d. 1555.
[168] p.
By Augustyne Fries, Prynted in Zurych : Anno M.D.XLVII. [1547]
A reply to Gardiner, Stephen. A detection of the Devils sophistrie. Signatures: A-X⁴. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
